0.title: Azure VMs
0.query:
fetch dt.entity.host
| filter isNotNull(azureVmSizeLabel)

// get carbon data
| lookup [fetch bizevents | filter event.provider == "dynatrace.biz.carbon"], lookupField:dt.entity.host, sourceField:id, prefix:"carbon."
| lookup [timeseries usage = avg(dt.host.cpu.usage), from:now()-3d, to:now(), rollup:max, interval: 30m, by:{dt.entity.host}],
          lookupField:dt.entity.host, sourceField:id, prefix:"cpu."
| lookup [timeseries usage = avg(dt.host.memory.usage), from:now()-7d, to:now(), rollup:max, interval:30m, by:dt.entity.host],
          lookupField:dt.entity.host, sourceField:id, prefix:"memory."
| lookup [fetch   dt.entity.azure_vm
          | fieldsSummary azureVmSize
          | expand values
          | parse values[value], "KVP{LD[a-zA-Z]+:key'='(LONG:valueLong | STRING:valueStr)','?}:vmsize"
          | fields label = replaceString(vmsize[label], ",",""),
                   numCores = vmsize[numCores],
                   memoryMb = vmsize[memoryMb]],
         lookupField:label,
         sourceField:azureVmSizeLabel,
         prefix:"azure_vm.size."
  

| fieldsAdd `cpu.usage_P95` = arrayPercentile(cpu.usage, 95),
            `memory.usage_P100` = arrayPercentile(memory.usage, 100)

| fields  `VM Name` = entity.name,
          `VM Size` = azureVmSizeLabel,
          `numCores` = azure_vm.size.numCores,
          `memoryMb` = azure_vm.size.memoryMb,
          `CPU` = `cpu.usage_P95`,
          `MEM` = `memory.usage_P100`,
          `C02 (kg)` = carbon.emissions,
          `Recommendation` = if(cpu.usage_P95 < 40 and memory.usage_P100 < 60, "â¬‡ï¸ Downsize", else: "ðŸŸ© OK")

| sort numCores desc, memoryMb desc

| fieldsRemove memoryMb, numCores

1.title: Hosts Recommended for Downsizing
1.query:
fetch dt.entity.host
| filter isNotNull(azureVmSizeLabel)
// get carbon data
//| lookup [fetch bizevents | filter event.provider == "dynatrace.biz.carbon"], lookupField:dt.entity.host, sourceField:id, prefix:"carbon."
| lookup [timeseries usage = avg(dt.host.cpu.usage), from:now()-3d, to:now(), rollup:max, interval: 30m, by:{dt.entity.host}],
          lookupField:dt.entity.host, sourceField:id, prefix:"cpu."
| lookup [timeseries usage = avg(dt.host.memory.usage), from:now()-7d, to:now(), rollup:max, interval:30m, by:dt.entity.host],
          lookupField:dt.entity.host, sourceField:id, prefix:"memory."

| fieldsAdd `cpu.usage_P95` = arrayPercentile(cpu.usage, 95),
            `memory.usage_P100` = arrayPercentile(memory.usage, 100)

| fields `Downsize` = if(cpu.usage_P95 < 40 and memory.usage_P100 < 60, true)

| filter isNotNull(Downsize)
| summarize count(), by:{Downsize}

2.title: Hosts Analysed
2.query:
fetch dt.entity.host
| filter isNotNull(azureVmSizeLabel)
| summarize count()

3.content:
## Azure VM Sizing Recommendations

Using statistical analysis of your VM activity over the last 7 days, these recommendations aim to help your reduce costs and CO2 emissions. 

The report is ordered by largest VM first/

### Calculation

The calculation is a multistage aggregation to gain intelligent insights into the utilisation of the VMs. It uses CPU and Memory usage as key metrics

*Stage 1* - Average metrics over 1m

*Stage 2* - Rollup the metrics into 30m buckets and take the MAX value

*Stage 3* - Take the P95 for CPU Usage and P100 for Memory Usage over last 7 Days

*Thresholds* - `IF P95 CPU < 40% AND P100 MEM < 60%` recommend downsize
